posts.title: My First Post
posts.content: This is the content of my first post. I'm excited to start blogging!

comments.content: Great post! Looking forward to reading more.
comments.author: 63867a4b5f4f17b60a4a9d86

posts.title: Learning Mongoose
posts.content: Mongoose is a great ODM for MongoDB. It's an essential tool for working with MongoDB in Node.js applications.

comments.content: I agree, Mongoose makes things so much easier!
comments.author: 63867a4b5f4f17b60a4a9d85

posts.title: JavaScript Async/Await
posts.content: In this post, I dive deep into JavaScript async/await and how it can simplify handling asynchronous code.

comments.content: This is super helpful, thanks for explaining async/await in a simple way!
comments.author: 63867a4b5f4f17b60a4a9d86

comments.content: I struggled with callbacks, but async/await made it much clearer.
comments.author: 63867a4b5f4f17b60a4a9d88

posts.title: CSS Grid vs Flexbox
posts.content: CSS Grid and Flexbox are two powerful layout tools for building responsive web designs. In this post, I'll compare both and when to use each.

comments.content: Great comparison! I always wondered when to use Flexbox over Grid.
comments.author: 63867a4b5f4f17b60a4a9d86

comments.content: CSS Grid is a game-changer for layouts!
comments.author: 63867a4b5f4f17b60a4a9d89
